treatments_page.heading: Dental Treatments
treatments_page.subheading: We offer a full spectrum of dental services to meet all your needs. From preventative care to complex restorations, our team is here to ensure your oral health.

doctors_page.heading: Our Expert Team
doctors_page.subheading: Our dedicated dentists combine years of experience with a passion for providing gentle, effective care. Get to know the professionals who will be crafting your smile.

about_page.heading: Welcome to Mentack Dental
about_page.subheading: Our mission is to deliver world-class dental care with a human touch.

story_section.heading: Our Story
story_section.content: Founded on the principles of integrity, innovation, and patient-centric care, Mentack Dental Clinic was established to create a new standard in dentistry. We believe that a visit to the dentist should be a positive and stress-free experience.

cards.title: Digital Diagnostics
cards.description: Advanced 3D imaging and digital X-rays for precise planning.

cards.title: Comfort-Designed Rooms
cards.description: Each treatment room is equipped for your comfort and relaxation.

cards.title: Advanced Sterilization
cards.description: Hospital-grade sterilization for your complete safety.

cards.title: Excellence

cards.title: Compassion
